rules_text:
Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Rogue[/b] | Creatures you control without trample can't be blocked if attacking creatures you control with trample are not blocked.
[b]Warrior[/b] | {2}: Target creature you control gains trample until end of turn.
